nav.div: West Allis-West Milwaukee School District » District » COVID - 19

td.p: All before and after school programs are cancelled.
All Recreation and Community Services Department programs are cancelled.
All extra-curricular and sporting events are cancelled.

span.em: Please keep in mind our situation is fluid. We continue to receive guidance from the CDC and the Wisconsin Department of Health Services.

td.p: Comienza el programa de distribución de comidas.
Todos los programas antes y después de la escuela se cancelan.
Todos los programas del Departamento de Recreación y Servicios a la Comunidad se cancelan.
Todos los eventos extracurriculares y deportivos se cancelan.

em.a: DISTRIBUCIÓN GRATUITA DE DESAYUNO Y ALMUERZO

span.a: K-12 School Closure Frequently Asked Questions
